statements: DELETE FROM location_marketing_campaigns WHERE location = 'New York' AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM CampaignStats WHERE stats_id = 100 AND location_id = 1;
DELETE FROM MarketingResults WHERE result_id = 15 AND revenue_generated > 5000;
DELETE FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND budget < 10000;
DELETE FROM Locations WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 100 AND interaction_type = 'click';
DELETE FROM location_data WHERE id = 1 AND campaign_id = 100;
DELETE FROM campaign_interaction WHERE campaign_id = 200 AND interaction_type = 'click';
